Styling

The styling for the polyline that displays found routes can easily be styled. To support more advanced styles, a number of styles can be added, making it possible to draw outlines, shadows, and similar.

The styles are specified in lineOptions, which contains an array of styles, which will be drawn in the order they're specified, which means that the first will be drawn at the bottom, and the last at the top.

▼More examples

L.Routing.control({
  waypoints: [
    L.latLng(48.8588,2.3469),
    L.latLng(52.3546,4.9039)
  ],
  lineOptions: {
    styles: [
      // Shadow
      {color: 'black', opacity: 0.8, weight: 11},
      // Outline
      {color: 'green', opacity: 0.8, weight: 8},
      // Center
      {color: 'orange', opacity: 1, weight: 4}
    ],
  }
}).addTo(map);
